name: GetPaymentRefund
description: Retrieves a specific refund using the `refund_id`.

refund_id.description: The unique ID for the desired `PaymentRefund`.

$block:
Defines the response returned by [GetRefund](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/refunds-api/get-payment-refund).

Note: If there are errors processing the request, the refund field might not be
present or it might be present in a FAILED state.

$ul: **errors**: Information about errors encountered during the request.

**amount_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency

**app_fee_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.

**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**created_at**: The timestamp of when the refund was created, in RFC 3339 format.
**id**: The unique ID for this refund, generated by Square.
**location_id**: The location ID associated with the payment this refund is attached to.
**order_id**: The ID of the order associated with the refund.
**payment_id**: The ID of the payment associated with this refund.
**processing_fee**: Processing fees and fee adjustments assessed by Square for this refund.
**updated_at**: The timestamp of when the refund was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
